title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.6 - Argument
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 52.6 - Argument

State Regulations

Oral argument may be made only before the commissioner in
charge of the hearing. Such oral argument may be limited by the commissioner in
his or her discretion and is to be included in the stenographic
record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
52.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
